title: Close to You
lyrics:
I just wanna be close to you
[Verse 1: BeBe Winans & 
CeCe WInans
]
Sunshine, moonlight, delight
Just a couple words describing who you are
Lovely, so lovely
Want everyone to know why I'm in love with you
Patient and strong, always
No matter what I face you've been there to see me through
Just right
 (Right on) 
on time
It took a while to see that your love was true
[Chorus: 
BeBe & CeCe Winans
, BeBe, 
CeCe
]
Now no one can (
Undo
)
'Cause I belong (
To you
)
Until the end (
Of time
)
It's good to know (
Good to know you're mine
)
And all i want (
To say
)
Until my dying (
Day
)
I just wanna be close to you
[Verse 2: BeBe Winans & 
CeCe Winans
]
Honest and sweet
Heaven is where I wanna be
Where I am when I'm with you
Perfect (
Perfect
), yes perfect
Is what He gave for all the world to see
[Chorus: 
BeBe & CeCe Winans
, BeBe, 
CeCe
]
Now no one can (
Undo
)
'Cause I belong (
To you
)
Until the end (
Of time
)
It's good to know (
You're mine
)
And all I want (
All I wanna do is say
)
'Til my dying (
'Til my dying day
)
I just wanna be close to you
[Bridge: 
BeBe & CeCe Winans
, BeBe, 
CeCe
]
Come on, CeCe, follow me
Dah dah, you say (
Dah dah
)
Dah dah
Dah dah dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah dah
Dah dah (
Mmm, mmm, dah dah
)
It took a while to see but now we know the truth
And no one can
[Chorus: 
BeBe & CeCe Winans
, 
BeBe
, CeCe]
Now no one can (Undo)
I belong (To you)
Until the end (Of time)
Good to know (Good to know you're mine)
Judging my will
 (Will)
How long will you stay?
I just wanna be close to you
Yeah yeah yeah yeah
How long will you stay?
 (
Hey
)
I just wanna be close to you
